name: Ishita Jhunjhunwala
position: Analyst at Deutsche Bank | Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur'24
about: I'm a final-year undergraduate from IIT Kharagpur and have a strong interest in software development and machine learning. I have a profound interest in problem-solving, data structures and algorithms. Additionally, I possess strong financial acumen. I'm always enthusiastic about learning and constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge in the tech and innovation space.
